1083858421802139648.text:
Designing validator workflow and talking to @dannyryan clarified a few crucial ETH2.0 concepts for me. I thought I'd share.
In ETH2.0, each validator gets assigned to two types of committees. 1.) crosslink (or shard) committee  2.) persistent committees

985572454973235200.text:
Quick sharding update:
 Teams are brainstorming how to use libp2p as a networking layer, creating effective shard discovery without bootnodes for each shard (risk of DoS)
  Researching local state storage for shards in the network (modified Merkle tree)
  More to come soon
